title: Mini-Ep 260: Cowlicks and Tarot
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 260: Cowlicks and Tarot
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, a listener goes back to the beginning and becomes a Forever35 Historian, someone writes in wondering if their haircuts will forever be dictated by their cowlick, and a listener has an inspiring visit to a museum. Plus, Kate gets her ta...
description:
In this episode, a listener goes back to the beginning and becomes a Forever35 Historian, someone writes in wondering if their haircuts will forever be dictated by their cowlick, and a listener has an inspiring visit to a museum. Plus, Kate gets her tarot cards read and Doree catches a cold.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter 


This episode is sponsored by:

PURPLE - Go to Purple.com/forever35, and use promo code F35. For a limited time, get 10% off any order of $200 or more!

CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.

BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.
